#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;

float mini(float x, float y) { return (x < y)? x: y; }

float fun(int h,int m){
	if(h<0 || h>23 || m<0 || m>59)
		return -1;	
	if(h==12)
		h=0;
	if(h>12)
		h=h-12;		
	float hour=0.5*((h*60)+m);		
	float min=6*m;
	float res=abs(hour-min);
	res=mini(360-res,res);
	return res;
}

int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		int h,m;
		float res;
		cin>>h;
		cin>>m;
		res=fun(h,m);
		if(res==-1)
			cout<<"Invalid Time"<<endl;
		else	
			printf("%0.1f\n",res);
	}
	return 0;
}
